name: Update Pipedrive person details from a custom webhook
description: Streamline your lead management process by integrating custom webhooks with Pipedrive. This template allows you to automatically update person information in Pipedrive whenever a specific event occurs via your custom webhook. Enhance your CRM efficiency and ensure your contact data is always up-to-date, saving you time and reducing manual entry errors. Perfect for businesses looking to automate their workflows and improve data accuracy in Pipedrive.
